posts.title: 5 Signs Your Small Business Needs a New Website
posts.description: Discover 5 key signs your small business needs a website redesign: outdated design, poor mobile experience, slow speeds & more. Get actionable tips!
posts.author: Digital Allies
posts.excerpt: In our fast-paced world, patience is in short supplyâ€”especially online. Studies show that if your website takes more than three seconds to load, many users will abandon it and look elsewhere. Slow websites not only frustrate visitors but also hurt your search engine rankings, making it harder for new customers to find you.
